Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Karththarukku Bayandhu, Avarudaiya Kattalaigalil Migavum Piriyamaayirukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
2 avan Sandhadhi Boomiyil Balaththirukkum, Semmaiyaanavargalin Vamsam Aaseervadhikkappadum.
3 aasthiyum Aisuvariyamum Avan Veettilirukkum; Avanudaiya Needhi Endraikkum Nirkum.
4 semmaiyaanavargalukku Irulile Velichcham Udhikkum; Avan Irakkamum Manaurukkamum Needhiyumullavan.
5 irangi Kadankoduththu, Than Kaariyangalai Niyaayamaanapadi Nadappikkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
6 avan Endrendraikkum Asaikkappadaadhiruppaan; Needhimaan Niththiya Keerththiyullavan.
7 thurseydhiyai Ketkiradhinaal Bayappadaan; Avan Irudhayam Karththarai Nambi Thidanaayirukkum.
8 avan Irudhayam Urudhiyaayirukkum; Avan Than Saththurukkalil Sarikkattudhalai Kaanumattum Bayappadaadhiruppaan.
9 vaariyiraiththaan, Ezhaigalukku Koduththaan, Avanudaiya Needhi Endrendraikkum Nirkum; Avan Kombu Magimaiyaai Uyarththappadum.
10 dhunmaarkkan Adhai Kandu Manamadivaagi, Than Parkalai Kadiththu Karaindhupovaan; Thunmaarkkarudaiya Aasai Azhiyum.
